name: Cauldron of Plenty
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Magic Items/Wondrous Items/Cauldron of Plenty

Construction.Requirements: Craft Wondrous Item, create food and water, heroes' feast

sections.body: This enchanted iron pot can produce nourishing, simple fare sufficient to feed up to 36 people per day upon command. Once per week it can also be commanded to create a heroes' feast for up to 12 people. The cauldron needs neither fire nor ingredients to produce food; it does so instantly upon command.
sections.name: Description
